com.deltadna.android.sdk.ads

Class DDNASmartAds

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deltadna.android.sdk.ads.DDNASmartAds

  • public final class DDNASmartAds
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class for accessing the deltaDNA SmartAds SDK.

    An instance should be retrieved by calling instance(). DDNA should be initialised and started before registering for ads through registerForAds(Activity). At the point where you would like to display an ad, use one of the static create methods in the InterstitialAd/RewardedAd classes.

    Listening for ad registration success or failure can be done using setAdRegistrationListener(AdRegistrationListener).

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DDNASmartAds.Configuration
      Provides a configuration when initialising the SDK through initialise(Configuration) inside of an Application class.
      static interface  DDNASmartAds.SettingsModifier

      • setAdRegistrationListener

        public void setAdRegistrationListener(@Nullable
                                      AdRegistrationListener listener)
        Sets a listener for ad registration status callbacks.

        The listener is stored as a weak reference so the instance should be attached to an object with a longer lifecycle, for example an Activity.

        Parameters:
        listener - the listener for ad registration status

      • getSettings

        public Settings getSettings()
        Gets the Settings used for SmartAds. Any changes made to the settings will be applied the next time registration for ads will take place.
